info.title: Purchase Requisition
info.description: The service contains header, item, account assignment, delivery address, and item text nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload. The information is used when creating, reading or updating a purchase requisition, with appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete purchase requisitions using this service from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud

values.text: [Physical Inventory - Inventory Count and Adjustment(OML)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/OML " Link To BP ")
[Guided Buying Capability with SAP Ariba Buying(2NV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2NV " Link To BP ")
[Service and Material Procurement - Project-Based Services(J13)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J13 " Link To BP ")
[Guided Buying Capability with SAP Ariba Buying(ONV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/ONV " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Accounting: Coding Block (FINS_CODING_BLOCK)
* Procurement: Purchase Requisition Item (MM_PURREQN_ITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
